channel.title: Oblivion-Pk Development l Nex With maps l Corporeal beast with maps l
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oblivion-pk.com/forums/images/redfox/misc/logo.png[/img] Welcome to the Development thread for Oblivion-Pk [Obpk] currently a solo project by Syndr0me Obpk was once a huge server owned and operated by Brent, Nick, and Sanity. Obpk had to versions a Version 1 which was mostly based on pking and such Version 2 on the other hand was much harder then version 1 and was based mostly on Skilling and economy. Our goals for Obpk are.... [ul][li]Create a succesfull Pking, Economy, skilling server[/li] [li]Create a long term server[/li] [li]Give the players what they want[/li] [li]To develop a server with mature, creative, responsible people[/li] [li]Create a fun filled server[/li] [li]Get around 100 players[/li] [li]Get a good clanning community[/li][/ul] Once the server has been developed we will be hosting it and running it on a, 1 Gb ram [16 gb burst] Intel Xeon x4 cores 3ghz processor Speed test [URL=http://www.speedtest.net][Img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1736604073.png[/img][/url] The forums will be at : [b]www.oblivion-pk.com/forums[/b] Features
[ul][li]Will load a few 642 maps[/li] [li]Has nex maps[/li] [li]Has the new corporeal beast maps[/li] [li]Has the ancient interface with miasmics[/li] [li]Will have all Godsword Effects , Zamorak spear effect and more[/li] [li]Hybriding will be alot of fun[/li][/ul]
If your wanting to see some media of the current development here you go.
[IMG]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/1148/corpbeast.png[/img] [IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/8629/fightcaves.png[/img] [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/5034/nexmaps.png[/img] [IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/8194/sorcgarden.png[/img]
To apply
Years of Developing? : What are you Applying for Client Developer, Server, Webmaster : Msn / Skype address ? : How many hows are you on a day? :
Contact me Skype : I_am_b0b Msn : najkausar@hotmail.com[/center]

item.title: Oblivion-Pk Development l Nex With maps l Corporeal beast with maps l
item.dc:creator: @oblivion-pk oblivion-pk
item.description:
@oblivion-pk wrote:

[center]

Welcome to the Development thread for Oblivion-Pk [Obpk] currently a solo project by Syndr0me

Obpk was once a huge server owned and operated by Brent, Nick, and Sanity. Obpk had to versions a Version 1 which was mostly based on pking and such Version 2 on the other hand was much harder then version 1 and was based mostly on Skilling and economy.

Our goals for Obpk are…

[ul][li]Create a succesfull Pking, Economy, skilling server[/li]
[li]Create a long term server[/li]
[li]Give the players what they want[/li]
[li]To develop a server with mature, creative, responsible people[/li]
[li]Create a fun filled server[/li]
[li]Get around 100 players[/li]
[li]Get a good clanning community[/li][/ul]

Once the server has been developed we will be hosting it and running it on a,

1 Gb ram [16 gb burst]
Intel Xeon x4 cores 3ghz processor

Speed test

The forums will be at : www.oblivion-pk.com/forums

Features

[ul][li]Will load a few 642 maps[/li] [li]Has nex maps[/li] [li]Has the new corporeal beast maps[/li] [li]Has the ancient interface with miasmics[/li] [li]Will have all Godsword Effects , Zamorak spear effect and more[/li] [li]Hybriding will be alot of fun[/li][/ul]

If your wanting to see some media of the current development here you go.

[IMG]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/1148/corpbeast.png[/img]

To apply

Years of Developing? : What are you Applying for Client Developer, Server, Webmaster : Msn / Skype address ? : How many hows are you on a day? :

Contact me

Skype : I_am_b0b

Msn : najkausar@hotmail.com[/center]

Read full topic
